Events that occurred on 9 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1881 - Scholar Lascelles Abercrombie is born.
1945 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 94b.
1964 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 254.
1965 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing Letter 267.
1965 - The fourteenth episode of the Princess-serialization of The Hobbit is published.
2003 - The Brazilian Tolkien society Heren Hyarmen changes its name to "Heren Hyarmeno".
2004 - The Times Literary Supplement publishes "Not Worn Lightly", Tom Shippey's review of The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels towards Caradhras.
A shadow passes above the Fellowship of the Ring before dawn.
